config.ShopItemPerRow.name: Shop Item Per Row
config.ShopItemPerRow.description: Number of items per row when a price must be displayed (e.g. regular shops).
config.DresserItemPerRow.name: Dresser Item Per Row
config.DresserItemPerRow.description: Number of items per row when there are no prices (e.g. dressers, catalogues).
config.StackCount.name: Stack Count on Shift+Ctrl
config.StackCount.description: Number of items to buy when using Shift+Ctrl (vanilla 25).
config.EnableSearchAndFilters.name: Enable Search and Filters
config.EnableSearchAndFilters.descriptio: Enable search box and category tabs (if the shop does not already have side tabs), this setting overrides the following ones.
config.EnableSearch.name: Enable Search
config.SearchBoxOffset.name: Search Box Offset
config.EnableTab.Category.name: Enable Tabs: Categories
config.EnableTab.Category.description: Enable tabs based on item categories.
config.EnableTab.DetailedSeeds.name: Enable Tabs: Detailed Seeds
config.EnableTab.DetailedSeeds.descripti: Enable separate tabs for crop/tree/bush seeds.
config.EnableTab.Recipes.name: Enable Tab: Recipes
